w :  where were you on christmas david ?  i called you several times and nobody was home .
m :  my parents and i traveled to australia to visit my uncle .  it was quite an experience to spend christmas in summer .

question: what do we learn from this conversation ?
choice: the man went to australia during christmas .
the man visited australia during the summer vacation .
the man didn ' t have a good time because of the different weather .
answer: the man went to australia during christmas .
